name: A Story of a Man Whose House Burned Down
name_original: A Story of a Man Whose House Burned Down
description:
A Story of a Man Whose House Burned Down

A little RPG of a man rebuilding his house after it was burned down in the middle of the night. Made for GDA (Game Development Amino) Jam in 2016 within one week.

Talk with all the villagers multiple times to get information what you should do. There are also at least two secrets in game. When you have gathered the sufficient materials for rebuilding the house, try to interact with the ruins of your old house.

Controls (Keyboard):

Moving: WASD

Interaction: Space

Back: Enter

Inventory: E

Map: M

Controls (XBOX controller):

Moving: Left stick

Interaction: A

Back: B

Inventory: Y

Map: X
